attributes.action: No Hard Border:  Keep Northern Ireland in the EU Customs Union and Single Market
attributes.background: With the twentieth anniversary upcoming of the Good Friday Agreement, we petition Parliament to safeguard the borderless peace and tariff-free economy of Northern Ireland after Brexit, by keeping it unconditionally within both the European Union's Customs Union and the EU Single Market #NoHardBorder

rejection.details: This is not something that the UK Government could do alone. You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to try to achieve this outcome in its negotiations with the EU, if that's what you would like to happen.
